tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I Shashi Bhushan Singh had visited Dr V.K Gupta for my son Shivansh Singh. My son had very severe chest congestion due to that he had breathing problems. Dr. V. K Gupta checked my son and treated him with care. My son got recovery in a day. We are blessed to have such a caring, humble and talented doctor. He was very friendly and helpful. He made everything very light for us. Even my son got better feelings. We are thankful to doctor for every support. He is so down to earth person inspite of well experienced and talents. He always answered our call whenever we required.  Doctors like V.K Gupta sir reminds God on earth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My child of age 5 had very serious issues of breathing. We had consulted some other doctor of other hospital where we did not have good experience.  But when we met Dr. V.K Gupta who made us and our child relaxed by his polite and kind words. He made everything light and treated our child with care. My child got relief in a day. I  like the most about Sir is his humbled nature. Most experienced, talented and most importantly ************* ****** down to earth. We called Sir many times and frequently but it was his goodness who responded us every time without any excuse.  Dr. V.K. Gupta you are truly a God to me . Thank you sir. Thank you so much. May Almighty God keep blessing you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have met the doctor for our son for various issues like weight loss, allergic bronchitis, and hand foot and mouth disease .It was a great experience as we could see the effect of the treatment very quickly and also he is always available on call and he also reverts bck.immediately for any our concerns ..I would highly recommend .Thanks a lot doctor for your patience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is extremely helpful and we are very satisfied with the treatment of our child. We have consulted Dr. VK Gupta for various issues like constipation, stomach infection, cough, cold, fever and even corona virus. The doctor has advised appropriate treatment and was available on phone for any contingencies as well. We are grateful to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: the only reason i went to him was it was a sunday and mostly all other doctors were not available. no wonder the clinic was empty. **** *** ****** ** **** ****** *** *** ******* ** ***** *** ******* **** *** ***** ******** ** ****** ** * **** *** *** ***** **** ******** we were already so worried and distressed and he increased it manyfolds. we are first time parents still learning and instead of counselling us, he was just telling us all the extreme negatives that could have happened or can happen to my baby. it was a distressing experience visiting this man and i hope to never see him again.
